title: Slate's Spoiler Specials: The Devil Wears Prada
description:
WARNING: This podcast is meant to be heard AFTER you've seen the movie. Slate movie critic Dana Stevens and cultural critic Amanda Fortini discuss the movie The Devil Wears Prada, starring Meryl Streep and Anne Hathaway.
        

Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
